Html:
Hi All!
I'm using PhpExcel ver 2.1, and I have a template excel (xls). In my template, I setted page order is "Over, then down". But after call "save('php://output')" method then I receive a file from browser with Page order has changed to "Down, then Over".
I don't know why!
Have you any solutions for me? Thanks!

Are you sure you're using PHPExcel version 2.1? Current production release is 1.8.0 (1.8.1 will be available later this month)

PHPExcel doesn't support changing calculation order, nor does any PHP Library for writing Excel files that I know
